name: AP_CLAIM_LETTERS
description: This table holds letters generated for AP claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the claim

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LTRS_GENERATED_ID
columns.description: Stores the letters generated for this claim.

columns.name: LTRS_GENERATED_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: LTRS_GENERATED_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the letter was generated.
